name: Sverd
description:
Turn-based strategy/exploration/survival dingsbums.

You can select the default "settlement" by clicking on it, and then build more units from the menu that appears on the left. Progress the turn by clicking "Go" in the corner, or Enter key. When built units appear, you can move them or interact by selecting them and then right-clicking another tile. Such as harvesting resources or building more buildings with the worker, or attacking the test enemies with a soldier (melee) or slinger (ranged).

Be warned, though: Very few things are working properly. Bugs galore, placeholder graphics, etc. There are no goals or point to the game yet.

Thanks for playing.
